name: energy-powder
effect: Used on a party Pokémon : Restores 50 HP. Decreases happiness by 5/5/10.

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: A bitter powder that restores HP by 50 points.
flavor_text.emerald: A bitter powder that restores HP by 50 points.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: A very bitter medicine powder. It restores the HP of one POKéMON by 50 points.
